level.text: Decorum and good order shall be maintained at all times during any hearing.
Any person who refuses to comply with a reasonable order may be excluded from the hearing by the person conducting the hearing.

level.heading: HISTORICAL NOTE
level.text: Prior to December 29, 1989, the D.C. Charitable Games Control Board published Final Rulemaking at 29 DCR 2202, 2210 (May 28, 1992).
